name: htmlfeed
author: Paul Gordon
description: The reference implementation library for downloading and displaying HTML feeds in the browser.

scripts.bundle-effects: tsc -p tsconfig.release.effects.json && terser ./+build/htmlfeed.effects.js > ./+build/htmlfeed.effects.min.js && npm run emit-css
scripts.bundle: tsc -p tsconfig.release.json && terser ./+build/htmlfeed.js > ./+build/htmlfeed.min.js && npm run emit-css
scripts.release: npm run bundle && cd ./+build && cp ../package.json ./package.json && np
